name: dial
description: radial slider on a numeric range

name: slider
description: vertical slider  on a numeric range

name: button
description: button that sends a single value

name: panel
description: container that holds an arbitrary number of elements in a layoutStyle (Horizontal, Vertical, Grid).

name: level
description: for 1d graphing.  Plots a single value (ie, output level monitoring)

name: state
description: displays a binary state (on, off), e.g. LED
